description: Prisma Extractor Interface. By Saulo Costa <https://github.com/saulotarsobc>

$schema.description: The JSON Schema url or path
$schema.title: $schema

outputType.description: The output type determines how the generated schema will be represented.
outputType.title: outputType

enumOutputType.description: The output type determines how the generated enums will be represented.
enumOutputType.title: enumOutputType

mapTypes.description: Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript interfaces

String.description: String - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
String.title: String

Int.description: Int - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
Int.title: Int

Float.description: Float - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
Float.title: Float

BigInt.description: BigInt - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
BigInt.title: BigInt

Boolean.description: Boolean - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
Boolean.title: Boolean

DateTime.description: DateTime - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
DateTime.title: DateTime

Json.description: Json - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
Json.title: Json

Decimal.description: Decimal - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
Decimal.title: Decimal

Bytes.description: Bytes - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
Bytes.title: Bytes

Unsupported.description: Unsupported - Maps Prisma model names to TypeScript types
Unsupported.title: Unsupported

mapTypes.title: mapTypes

generateMetadata.description: Whether to generate metadata for the extracted schemas
generateMetadata.title: generateMetadata

relationFieldsOptional.description: Marks relation fields (kind 'object', including lists) as optional in generated types.
relationFieldsOptional.title: relationFieldsOptional
